text:
@BorisJohnson It's called the Flu you barm pot. 
You's have been Falsely Diagnosing the death certificates from day one. I have a family member who died of stage 4 cancer you put COVID-19 on the death certificate.
Now your double-counting COVID-19 test.
WHY? WHY? WHY?  
I and 1000 more know
